name: Sputnik
overview: 3024. The world is dominated by machines. Robots you have finally got bend the human race. Only hope remains for foreign aid. We must send a cosmic "S O S". For this we have the help of a small android (ZX-AMS- + 3) remote controlled from our computer. With it we must enter the telespace communications center and, bypassing the control automatons. the bionic plasmas, labyrinths, tunnels and endless dangers, put the new interstellar radio message system consisting of spherical modules is up and running with anteniform terminals: the sputniks, which are distributed throughout the building. Keep in realize that the bacteria in your robot are not eternal. Sharpen your ear, sharpen your eyes and try it. Humanity is in your hands ...
